title: US Army Troop Transport Trailer
item_description:
US Army Troop Transport Trailer

Trailer Details

  • ID: 07J47470
  • Key: Not Available

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 371”
  • Overall Width: 96”
  • Overall Height: 133”
  • Deck Length: 349”
  • Deck Width: 96”
  • Side Height: 101”
  • Width Between Fenders: 96”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 1
  • Number of Wheels: 5
  • Tire Size: 8.25-20
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: An ID Number or Serial Number was located on this item, but no record was found with CA DMV. No title. Buyer will get Bill of Sale/Statement of Facts 1-2 weeks following the close of the removal. The buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the DMV registration process, including inspections, registration, transfer, and fees due, necessary to obtain a title/registration if they so choose.
